content:
Knobel/Czosnek family

1 Markus KNOBLACH/CZOSNEK
 + Rachel                            (Herszl)
  2x Moses Jakob KNOBLACH/CZOSNEK    1781
    + Rifka LEBZELTNER               1780-82 - 1819 #116
          married Oct 30, 1803 Krakow

             married Jul 1, 1824 #23
